title: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's future.
creator: Vince Gilligan

title: Game of Thrones
description: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns.
creator: David Benioff & D.B. Weiss

title: The Simpsons
description: The satirical animated series centered around a working-class family in the fictional town of Springfield.
creator: Matt Groening
